cold.Salad: Salad: A refreshing mix of leafy greens, vegetables, and sometimes fruits or nuts, often topped with a tangy dressing. Popular variations include Caesar, Greek, and garden salads.

cold.Cold Sandwhich: A versatile food made with bread, meats (like turkey or ham), cheese, and veggies. Typically served chilled with condiments like mayo or mustard.

cold.Sushi: Bite-sized rolls or slices of rice, seafood, and vegetables, often wrapped in seaweed. Served cold and paired with soy sauce, wasabi, or pickled ginger.

cold.Gazpacho: A chilled tomato-based soup originating from Spain, made with blended vegetables like cucumbers, peppers, and garlic.

cold.Fruit Salad: A sweet and juicy mix of fresh fruits like berries, melons, and grapes, often tossed with a touch of honey or mint.

cold.Ceviche: A seafood dish made with raw fish or shrimp cured in citrus juice, mixed with onions, peppers, and herbs for a tangy, cold appetizer.

cold.Pasta Salad: A chilled dish of cooked pasta tossed with vegetables, meats, cheese, and a flavorful dressing like Italian or vinaigrette. Often a favorite at picnics and BBQs.

hot.Pizza: A classic dish with a dough base topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings like pepperoni, vegetables, or mushrooms, baked to perfection.

hot.Soup: A warm, comforting dish made from simmering ingredients like vegetables, meats, or grains in broth. Popular varieties include chicken noodle, tomato, and minestrone.

hot.Grilled Cheese Sandwich: A simple, gooey delight made with melted cheese sandwiched between toasted bread slices, often paired with tomato soup.

hot.Pasta: A versatile Italian dish served hot, with noodles like spaghetti or penne combined with sauces like marinara, Alfredo, or pesto. Often includes meat or vegetables.

hot.Steak: A juicy, grilled or pan-seared cut of beef, seasoned and cooked to your preferred level of doneness, often served with sides like mashed potatoes or vegetables.

hot.Burgers: A hot sandwich consisting of a grilled beef patty (or alternative protein), cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and condiments, all layered between a toasted bun.

hot.Stir-Fry: A flavorful dish of meat, vegetables, and noodles or rice, cooked quickly in a hot wok with sauces like soy, teriyaki, or hoisin, often served steaming hot.
